tool_description: Get movies and TV shows in MP4 from Amazon Prime Video.
name: Amazon Video MP4
title: Amazon Video MP4

api_list.name: AMV Points
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-video-mp4.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-video-mp4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-video-mp4.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-video-mp4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
